title: ollama/ollama
summary: Get up and running with Llama 3.2, Mistral, Gemma 2, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python library for Ollama allowing easy integration of local LLMs into Python apps.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript library for Ollama with Node and browser support.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration for Ollama models enabling chains, agents, RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama with chat, model management, RAG, and multi-user support.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with Spring Boot starters and fluent DSL.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local Ollama models into GitHub Copilot-like inline suggestions.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Ready-to-run RAG templates using Ollama embeddings and Chroma/Qdrant vector stores.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration providing OllamaGenerator and OllamaEmbedder nodes.

title: ollama-cli-tools
summary: Collection of shell scripts for bulk model pulls, tagging, and GPU monitoring.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that brings local LLM chat to any server using Ollama.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selection and autoscaling.

title: ollama-express
summary: Express.js middleware that proxies and caches Ollama endpoints for web apps.

title: ollama-keras
summary: Keras3 wrapper for Ollama allowing fine-tune and evaluation of local models.

title: ollama-django
summary: Django app with admin UI for managing Ollama models and logging chat history.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Async Rust client for Ollama using reqwest and native-tls with full type safety.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat component library for rapid prototyping with Ollama models.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET 8 client for Ollama with dependency injection and minimal API examples.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin for local AI-assisted note writing and summarization via Ollama.

title: ollama-model-zoo
summary: Community-curated list of custom Ollama Modelfiles with performance benchmarks.
